summary: The United States belongs to several multilateral organizations with North and South American countries—such as the Organization of American States, Pan American Health Organization, Inter-American Institute for Cooperation on Agriculture, and Pan-American Institute of Geography and History. We found that the U.S. paid over 57% of the total annual fees (assessed contributions) for these organizations between 2014 and 2016. The State Department continues to work...
title: Inter-American Organizations: Efforts Ongoing for Quota Reform at the Organization of American States, but Reaching Agreement Will Be Difficult
